description: This file defines a UI component named 'Card' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies the component's template, default state, and a 'ready' hook that sets up shader effects.

classes.name: Card
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a styled card with effects, positioned in the center of the screen.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the default state object for positioning and effects.

methods.name: hooks.ready
methods.description: Initializes shader effects when the component is ready.
